data.title: Andy Roberts
data.meta_description: Andy Roberts is an uncouth, robust pig-of-a-man who served as a potential buyer for the town of Schitt's Creek, albeit briefly. data.text:
Andy Roberts is an uncouth, robust pig-of-a-man who served as a potential buyer for the town of Schitt's Creek, albeit briefly. He came into money from his family making a fortune in the shelving business.

He was invited to the Schitt's house with the Rose's for dinner, after which they would sign the contract, finalising the sale. However, before he could sign on the dotted line to officially buy the town for 1 million dollars, he, to Johnny and Moira's dismay, slipped into a coma; Partially due to consuming a large amount of Jocelyn Schitt's homemade macaroni and cheese.

He makes his only appearance in the episode Town for Sale.

Appearances[]

Season 1[]

Town for Sale
